strings.Value: "I have no questions right now. Farewell."
"You're doing a good thing. May Erastil never abandon you."

{n}You see a tall woman dressed in simple but rugged traveling clothes.{/n} "Greetings, Your {mf|Grace|Grace|Highness|Highness}! I'm Ilga, leader of these pilgrims in honor of {g|Erastil}Erastil{/g}. I meet with travelers and deal in the goods our small community creates. How can I be of service?"

"Not quickly, Your {mf|Grace|Grace|Highness|Highness}. Temples like this take dozens of years to build, and I fear a full restoration won't be much faster. But we're happy to be able to touch the holy shrine and do our part to ensure its future greatness."
"Thank you, Your {mf|Grace|Grace|Highness|Highness}! May he bless you as well!"
